column4: Hey, whats the easiest way to move shit around on an ubuntu server? no gui installed
ok moving stuff around like 50 operations and i dont want it to take 30 minutes
is that short for something or a command for the prompt?
or if you are accessing said machine remotely via ssh, use the -Y switch when you ssh in and then you can use GUI apps which will run in CPU and Memory space on the remote machine
